      • registerMutation

        public void registerMutation(java.lang.String host,
                             UrlMutation urlMutation)
        A mutation is a proxy for url's starting with a prefix so you can manipulate them before they are send to the client
        Parameters:
        host - The starting part of an url. Example: https://soundcloud.com/
        urlMutation - Your UrlMutation implementation
